resources.string: Put your headset on now and follow instructions. Don\'t change the volume during the process.\n This is needed for optimal listening and hearing performance.
You are going to hear an audio clip. Adjust the wheel where the audio sounds the most comprehensible sound for you.
Next you are going to hear sounds. The app will measure your hearing threshold in different frequencies.\n Press and HOLD the button down the WHOLE time you are hearing the sound.
This list contains media files saved on the device.
List of files used in the calibration.
This list will contain latest played files.
SCROLL the wheel until the voice sounds as combrehensible as possible. Then tap DONE.
